verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: For the umpteenth time] , [ARG0: Counselor to President Trump Kellyanne Conway] [V: battled] [ARG1: CNN host Chris Cuomo] [ARGM-TMP: during Monday ’s New Day] [ARGM-LOC: in a marathon shoutfest ( almost 30 minutes in length )] [ARGM-ADV: with the topics de jure being James Comey ’s book tour and the Russia investigation] .

For the umpteenth time , Counselor to President Trump Kellyanne Conway battled CNN host Chris Cuomo during Monday ’s New Day in a marathon shoutfest ( almost 30 minutes in length ) with [ARG1: the topics] [ARGM-MNR: de jure] [V: being] [ARG2: James Comey ’s book tour and the Russia investigation] .
